EnglishDom :  1.    . 2.  . 3.  -. 4.        . 5.     . 6.    . 7.   YouTube.      ?   EnglishDom      ! Englishdom is an online English language school, one of the leaders in Eastern Europe. The school combines individual lessons with an online teacher and an independent study of English on its own educational platform where you can train various language skills and take an online course.   ED Class is an application for Englishdom students, with which you can: - view and manage class schedules; - control and replenish the balance; - conduct an online lesson with a teacher (in development); - perform homework in English (partially); - learn English words (partially); - contact your personal curator; - Receive class notifications.  The application is part of the EnglishDom ecosystem for learning English. EnglishDom is: 1. One-to-one English classes online. 2. Conversation clubs. 3. Interactive online courses. 4. Free simulator for learning new words and grammar. 5. An application for learning English words. 6. Application of English courses. 7. Channel on YouTube.  Is there a goal to learn English? Join EnglishDom - we will help you achieve it!
